short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads all images in a Tapestry observation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes it easier to download all media (pictures and videos) from Tapestry observations. Tapestry only allows you to export as PDF but if you want to create an album of Tapestry pictures, you are out of luck. Best way to do this is to right click every image and select "save image as", which can be a long task if the observation has a lot of images.

With Tap Tap, you can download all images, all videos or both, with a click of a button!
